boardgame.name: Dungeon Twister
boardgame.description: Dungeon Twister is a 2-player high level strategy game where 2 teams of adventurers with various powers are trapped in a dungeon. The board is composed of 8 rooms that can be moved and rotated by the players. Each turn, a player is able to spend actions to move around the dungeon, pick up and use items, battle with the opponents team, or turn and move the rooms of the dungeon._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The goal is to reach 5 victory points. Points are collected by moving adventurers out of the dungeon or by killing an opponent's adventurer. Objects are disseminated across the whole dungeon and will bring the adventurers well-needed powers._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player has the same characters, each with different powers. Some run fast, some fight or disarm traps. The cleric heals, magician burns everything in sight, and the goblin is so weak that the simple fact of getting him out will bring you two victory points._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Combat and actions are managed via cards. To move, fight, heal, or turn a room, you must manage action points obtained by playing cards. Those cards are not drawn but selected from a set of cards by both players. Both players have access to the same panel of cards at the beginning of the game, so the game is really about managing the resources and adapting to the changing environment._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Dungeon Twister is the original game in the Dungeon Twister series_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Asmodee Editions (ASM DT01US) Dungeon Twister is a board game for two players by Christophe Boelinger. Basically you are in control of a team of eight adventurers who have a range of amazing powers and abilities. You now have the power to pass through walls, throw fire balls, shatter metal, regenerate your body. Dungeon Twister is definitely not just a simple game in a box: it is designed to be played casually or in tournaments. Add-on components will soon be available using the same rules, but they will also introduce new characters, new rooms and new objects, thus allowing you to play with two to three other players! Walls don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t scare him! A game of strategy, Dungeon Twister calls on the tactical senses of the players as well as their bluffing skills! A highly tuned finesse for movements is required along with ease in using magic objects and rotating rooms and combat intelligence. The ability to anticipate the enemy_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s actions will allow you to emerge victorious and to be the first one to get out of the dungeon... or help to eliminate your opponents! Content: 8 square rooms 2 starting zones 2 sets of game pieces (8 characters and 6 objects per player) 2 sets of 8 figurines and 16 plastic bases 2 decks of 16 cards 20 open/closed markers 10 markers to count game actions 1 rule book Game Duration: About 45 minutes Age: 11 and up Number of Player: 2

Dungeon Twister is a 2-player high level strategy game where 2 teams of adventurers with various powers are trapped in a dungeon. The board is composed of 8 rooms that can be moved and rotated by the players. Each turn, a player is able to spend actions to move around the dungeon, pick up and use items, battle with the opponents team, or turn and move the rooms of the dungeon. The goal is to reach 5 victory points. Points are collected by moving adventurers out of the dungeon or by killing an opponent_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s adventurer. Treasures are disseminated across the whole dungeon and will bring the adventurers well-needed powers. Each player has the same characters, each with different powers. Some run fast, some fight or disarm traps. The cleric heals, magician burns everything in sight and the goblin is so weak that the simple fact of getting him out will bring you two victory points. Combat and actions are managed via cards. To move, fight, heal or turn a room, you must manage action points obtained by playing cards. Those cards are not drawn but selected from a set of cards by both players. Both players have access to the same panel of cards at the beginning of the game so the game is really about managing the resources and adapting to the changing environment.

Size: Medium Standard Information listed on all my For Sale Games: ------------------------------------------------------ 1) Shipping cost is the highest cost of all games purchased + the add on cost of each other game. Promo cards or anything else that fits in a bubble mailer will have a base cost of $5 and and an add on cost of $1, a small game has a base cost of $8 and an add on cost of $2, a medium game has a base cost of $14 and an add on cost of $3 and a large game has a base cost of $20 and add on cost of $4. Anything outside that range will be listed specifically. If you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re providing a business address to ship to, take a $1 off the shipping. 2) Purchase a $100 or more worth of games and get 5% off your total order. 3) Purchase $200 or more and get 5% off and free shipping. 4) If you see any games on my for trade list that aren_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t up for sale, feel free to ask me to add to the market. 5) Most conditions are listed as very good, all those items listed as such range from very good to like new. 6) Amazon and game store gift cards are usually accepted but please check with me first if that_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s an option you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like to pursue. 7) I try to list editions but if an edition isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t listed and it matters to you, please ask! Bundle including the following: Dungeon Twister Base Game - unplayed, partially punched, expansion compatible upgraded components included (original components also included), all components in excellent condition, box has very slight shelf wear and looks near new Dungeon Twister: Paladins _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons - unplayed, punched, all components in excellent condition, box has very slight shelf wear and looks near new Dungeon Twister: 3/4 Players Expansion - unplayed, punched, all components in excellent condition, box has very slight shelf wear and looks near new Dungeon Twister: Forces of Darkness - unplayed, partially punched, expansion compatible upgraded components included (original components also included), all components in excellent condition, box has very slight shelf wear and looks near new Payment by PayPal in advance or cash on pickup. For shipping this is considered a very large size game, and can only ship via FedEx or multiple USPS Priority Mail boxes. The following options are available for delivery within the continental United States: 1) Local pickup in the San Jose, California area (no cost) 2) USPS Priority Mail Flat Rate - $6.60 (small), $12.65 (medium), or $17.15 (large), depending on game size. Generally very small games fit in the small box, small or medium in the medium box, and large in the large box. Box fits for some games are very snug, allowing minimal protective padding - if this shipping option is picked for such games seller assumes no responsibility for damage during transit. 3) USPS Parcel Select Ground / Non-Flat Rate Priority - varies, usually only cheaper than Flat Rate Priority for small and very light weight games (under 2 pounds), an additional fee of $3.25 for the box and packing materials will be added to the shipping costs. 4) FedEx Ground - varies, usually from $12 for short distance shipments of light weight games to $30 for heavy games (or multiple games up to 10 pounds) or long distance shipments. This is usually the cheapest option for very large games. An additional fee of $3.25 for the box and packing materials will be added to the shipping costs. While expensive, this is the best method if damage during transit is a concern, as all items will be packed in boxes sufficiently sized for protective materials. Shipping rates to Alaska or Hawaii will be higher for FedEx. Games will not be shipped by any method other than a shipping box, nor unboxed or in less than complete condition, please do not ask.

Since October 2011 PP-fees are 0,35 Euro + (from 3,9% to 5,2%) of the total. For nearly all countries outside Europe, apart from USA and Canada (both 3,9%), the rate is 5.2%.
